name: avatar
author: Glen Fonceca
preview: Customizable avatar component with three display types: image, placeholder icon, and user initials. Supports multiple sizes, shapes, and colors with automatic fallback handling.

props.name: type
props.description: Avatar display type: 'image', 'placeholder', or 'initials'. Defaults to 'placeholder'

props.name: src
props.description: Image source URL for 'image' type avatars. Automatically falls back to initials if image fails to load

props.name: name
props.description: User name for generating initials and accessibility. Defaults to 'User'

props.name: alt
props.description: Alternative text for accessibility. Falls back to name if not provided

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes for custom styling

props.name: bgColor
props.description: Background color in hex format. Defaults to '#6366f1' (indigo)

props.name: textColor
props.description: Text/icon color in hex format. Defaults to '#ffffff' (white)

props.name: onError
props.description: Callback function triggered when image fails to load
